title: After Being Transferred to Another World I Became a Magical Swordsman - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Alternate World   Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Dwarfs   Elves   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Guilds   Hiding True Abilities   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   S*aves   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Shinkou Shotou   進行諸島
description: Suzumiya Kaede, a gamer, fell asleep while playing a game all night and when he woke up he found himself in another world, a fantasy world where using magic is possible! Using his knowledge of games, skills, and cheats, Kaede decides to enjoy as much of his new life in a different world through his newly-acquired magic and sword!>
